Sequence Information.Source: Gray short-tailed opossum,Monodelphis domestica, South America

Literature.Author: Peel E, Cheng Y, Djordjevic JT, Kuhn M, Sorrell T, Belov K.2017
Literature.Title: Marsupial and monotreme cathelicidins display antimicrobial activity, including against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 20 uM), S. aureus ATCC29213 or MRSA (MIC 10 uM), S. pyogenes ATCC19615 (MIC 20 uM), S. agalactiae ATCC 12386 (MIC 20 uM), S. dysgalactiae (MIC 20 uM), S. lutetiensis (MIC 20 uM), S. equi (MIC 20 uM), S. salivarius (MIC 10 uM), fungi C. parapsilosis ATCC22019 (MIC 10 uM), and C. krusei ATCC6258 (MIC 20 uM).MOA: Have an effect on membranes. Updated 7/2023
